website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some issues, the quality, price, and warranty make it worth considering.
pros: Earns a lot of praise for its rugged stainless steel build and outstanding unconditional lifetime guarantee
Falls on the middle of the price scale
cons: Garlic tends to get stuck in it, and it's difficult to clean
It also takes quite a bit of pressure to squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Bad design in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back. Bad design in my opinion. I'm not sure if the one I got was a bad one or not but I was not impressed. Area where you put the garlic had gaps on the sides so the garlic leaked through the sides instead of coming out of the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: the best part of this gadget is the garlic peeler, which is an inexpensive piece of rubbery material. the press itself is terrible. plan on spending too much time cleaning out a terrible and poorly designed device. the peeler? amazing, should cost less than a dollar. the press? a disaster. don't buy it. spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: your mother

customer_reviews.title: Nice press.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this press due to my frustration with trying to keep my old school press clean, it always seemed like I could dice the garlic by hand faster than cleaning the old press. And it never seemed to get really clean, there were always a few holes plugged no matter what I did. This one holds more, squishes easily and is a relative breeze to clean. I just swab it out and toss it in the dishwasher and it's all good. It comes in a fancy box too, I don't care about that personally but it would make for a cute gift. Overall a good product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ranman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My old garlic press was one of the cheaper models and the top metallic layer was starting to come off and get gray bits in my food, so I wanted to replace it with something nicer. This gets the job done I guess, but I wish I'd bought a different model. This one is made out of metal that's bent into the proper shape rather than being one seamless piece, and garlic bits often get stuck in the seams on the edge from the pressure. At least I know what to look for next time I want to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: K. DohertyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This is a great garlic press
customer_reviews.text: This is a great garlic press. I cook meals on a daily basis, and I use a LOT of freshly minced garlic. This press is sturdy, and fits multiple cloves into the reservoir for pressing. The only feature of this product that I do not love is that the garlic sometimes gets stuck in the press. This makes it difficult to clean the press, but eventually will come clean with a little bit of TLC. Still, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bean & PeanutTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worst Garlic Press Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe anyone would rate this press highly. I used it once and immediately ordered something else. It feels flimsy, the press basin is small, it's hard to clean, and worst of all the press basin floats between the two handles which means that when you pull the handles apart the press remains shut. You have to manually pull the floating piece out of the press basin and get garlic juice on your fingers. Worst design ever! The garlic peeler on the other hand works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: It is all good quality stainless steel but it is VERY hard to clean after use. Garlic skins get pressed into the corners of the box which are not solid and open. You have to get a pointed tool or butter knife to remove the skins and there is no way to get the pressed garlic left overs in the bottom out other than to dig them out.
customer_reviews.author: 1carpen

customer_reviews.title: Beware of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Not a satisfactory garlic press. The garlic cup is made by folding the metal. When you press the garlic it some comes through the folds and makes for more difficult cleaning. Needed both hands the open after pressing as the press sticks in the cup. It is a nice looking and heavy duty stainless steel but the design is flawed
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Falls short on ease.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the handles are too short to get leaverage when pressing the garlic. Secondly, after you press the garlic, you have to use two hands to open the chamber to put more garlic in it because it sticks. Thirdly, alot of the garlic ends up outside the press on the inside of the container where you put the garlic. I do not recommend this press!
customer_reviews.author: LL Thorn Bird

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had a difficult time applying enough force to get this to work. Seemed more than others we've used (we've been through 3 different ones recently on the hunt for the perfect one). It also was more complicated to use, my husband had to inquire about which side and where to put the garlic. It's not as intuitive as others that have less moving parts. It also was harder to clean, messier to get the garlic out, and having to whip out the brush each time is annoying, plus the bristles get stuck in the press sometimes. I think it really depends on what other things you want other than sqooshing garlic, but this one went back.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not actually an improvement over my older press
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it claimed to structurally prevent the phenomenon of garlic squirting up around the sides of the chamber, and to be easy to clean, both of these qualities being superior to the typical two-piece garlic crusher such as the one I’ve been using for 20 years. Surprisingly, this device squirts back far more garlic than any other press I’ve seen in 40 years. Big gaps between the crusher plate and the walls of the chamber. And the experience of cleaning it is the same finger-picking I’ve always had to do. It is very shiny stainless. I expect I should feel cheffy for owning it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daguerre

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This press doesn’t even have room for an average sized clove of garlic. The point of a garlic press is to remove the extra steps of removing the skin and cutting. This does not meet that expectation and was way too hard to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: Used for a few weeks, got so frustrated that half of the garlic was getting stuck in the press, and threw it in the trash. Just use a microplane!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lukralle

customer_reviews.title: Works, with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good product. It gets the job done, and definitely beats chopping garlic by hand. However, because of the way the metal is constructed, small garlic pieces tend to get stuck between the metal gaps. Also, it's not always easy to get the small garlic pieces out from the holes either. The small cleaning brush is no use at all. After purchasing this, I came across a different design in Macy's, where it includes a small device with multiple prongs to clean the holes. I wish this one has it too. Also, I wish the levers were longer so that people with weaker arms can use it too. The garlic peeler does work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: High quality, hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works well for garlic. Works badly for fresh ginger. Kind of difficult to clean - excess fibers get stuck and compressed into the device. Maybe that's normal though? I've never had a garlic press before. If you've also never had a garlic press before, user beware - this "juices" and grinds up your garlic so well, a little goes a long way. I ruined one dish with too much garlic, which I'd never done before! Try half your usual number of cloves and go cautiously from there.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I don't like to peel garlic before I crush it, and this can handle it with ease. It has a nice weight to it, and appears very solid. It is fairly easy to clean. The peeler thing that comes with it is pretty nifty too, for those times you want whole cloves. The box it came in was a very nice presentation. This would make a great gift, and will look like you paid a lot more for it.
customer_reviews.author: A Kiehle

customer_reviews.title: Garlic Roller Really Works, and the Press Provides Good Leverage for quick Processing
customer_reviews.text: The roller really works, which saves a lot of time and garlicky fingertips in peeling your garlic. The press is different from the usual designs in that the press area where you load the garlic actually swings freely from both the upper and lower handles which makes cleaning easier. It is just large enough (still small enough to conveniently store) to give you good leverage to apply to the press which makes fast work of getting your pressed garlic. All the fittings and joints look very sturdy. I expect it to last many years though I can't say for sure because I've only been using it (frequently) for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Herr KJD

customer_reviews.title: Almost no waste!
customer_reviews.text: I like this garlic press a lot. My previous garlic press broke after 12 years or so, in looking for a replacement on Amazon, I found that this one had excellent reviews (I probably read over 25 reviews). I wish the garlic compartment was a little bit bigger, but it still fits 2 medium cloves. I really like that it presses most of the garlic, so there is little waste! With my previous press, I had a lot of big chunks coming out the sides that I had to continue feeding to the press, but it still couldnt press it all. I havent tried pressing unpeeled garlic yet nor ginger. That's next :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: works great but QC a little lacking
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it works and cleans up but that first press was a pain. There was a little tang of metal on the end cap of the top piece that poked a nice hole in the palm of my hand, see picture. It was quickly removed with a file but still their QC should have caught it. Now it works great and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Squire

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The black plastic around one of the handles broke and the metal on the handle has bent from the pressure of squeezing. All in less than a month of receiving the press. We’ve rigged new handles on it since the press still works, but 1 star given for poor quality of materials and breaking in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom around the same time that I got her something to help her prep lemons faster. This garlic press gets a lot of use. I've also borrowed it and the peeler it comes with and it works really well. The skins come off quickly and I can press a few cloves at the same time, adding a lot of flavor, more than if I stunk up my hands by mincing the stuff myself. My mom has trouble with strength in her hands but doesn't have a problem using this or cleaning it. Solid recommendation on both our parts.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Ymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I truly love this tool. It works exactly as described and on that, it's great. The one thing I am not fond of is the cleaning part, specifically the holes. Strings of garlic get lodged in the holes and the only way to clean it is by using a fork, knife, or some other sturdy utensil as water alone does not do the job. I had a garlic press some time ago with an attached plastic head that had short pegs that lined up with the holes on the press and easily pushed out anything stuck. So as an improvement, that is what I would like to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Garlic skin hard to get out once garlic is pressed
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent garlic press, but the skin of the garlic (after the garlic has been pressed) stays in the mincer, and is a little hard to get out. You have to remove this skin before the second garlic will press through the mincer. It just takes a little digging and it will, eventually, come out. I like that it is stainless steel and will not rust. I especially love the silicone roller peeler. It really works--just pop the garlic clove in, roll it around on the counter top, and the clove comes out clean ad ready to mince---Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Bunnylulu

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: After 15 years our OXO garlic press wore out. Bought this one and it wore out in less than a month. It has too many moving parts. I've no idea why the basket is separate from the handles but it resulted in garlic escaping out the backsides when pressing. One of the handles broke and it is irreparable. Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Superb product.
customer_reviews.text: Our Pampered Chef garlic press's finish started to come off, making it unsightly. It was also a pain to clean ... trust me, I know. I do the dishes and we use a lot of garlic. I opted to pay the premium price for this garlic press and am very happy I did. It is extremely well manufactured, very high quality, and works very well as a garlic press (from my wife and wonderful chef), and from my perspective it extremely easy to clean. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This garlic press is easy to use and easy to clean - minced the garlic perfectly. The silicone tube also works well for removing the outer peeling, although it took me a few tries to figure out the right amount of pressure to use. I particularly appreciated receiving an e-mail from the seller right after I made the purchase - an e-mail that had instructions on how to use the press and the peeler. There were good instructions included with the press, but it was still nice to get that extra attention from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Weird design buy OXO brand instead
customer_reviews.text: Love alpha grillers and have two of their thermometers. That said this garlic press has issues. Like that it’s all stainless steel but inner basket moves separately when you open it all up. This does not make it clean easier only harder. There is on no reason for this design. I bought it for the RV. I have an oxo one that I love that does the same thing without having this extra little swinging basket. It works but definitely more difficult to clean! Get the oxo one!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: I love this garlic press!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old garlic press that I didn't like. It was cheaply made, didn't hold much garlic, and was hard to clean. The Alpha garlic press is totally different. It holds more garlic than my old press, and it is easy to use. It feels good in my hand as I press down on the garlic. I am still trying to figure out the best way to remove all the garlic remnants from the little holes. Time will tell if it holds up, but so far it looks like it is well made. Overall, I really like it and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: The Handle Fell off
customer_reviews.text: The handle feel off about 6 months after I purchased it. I let Amazon know but they really couldn't help me because it was after the return was long over. I am trying the garlic twist and an oxo garlic press to see which I like better. I will return one or the other. But this one is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: syoozi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to clean
customer_reviews.text: I hate this garlic press. The space that the garlic goes into has 2 open seams that the garlic gets pressed into making it very difficult to clean. That same part is articulated for no apparent reason. They should have welded those two seams. I am going to throw it away and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first garlic press we’ve had. So much easier and faster than mincing with a knife! We haven’t used the peeler because we’ve had easy peel garlic cloves that are larger than the peeler. The only drawback we’ve come across is larger cloves need to be cut in halves or quarters to fit in the press, but that’s still quicker than mincing. The press is pretty easy to clean, just takes some getting used to but that could also be because this is our first. Overall we love it and are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This garlic press comes packaged so nice, would make a great gift for someone who ...
customer_reviews.text: This garlic press comes packaged so nice, would make a great gift for someone who loves to cook. I had a garlic press before this one that was awful. Ended up tossing it in the garbage. I could never get it to work right. So far this one does just what it should. Its build really well. No cramping your hand trying to get it to press. Its also easy to clean and larger than the last one I owned. The little roller thing is great for cleaning up your garlic before pressing. Simply pop it in and roll it back and forth apply pressure. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy, gets the job DONE! My husband is an amateur chef, and he was very impressed... Since I'm usually the one doing all the smashing and peeling of the garlic, I was the most interested in that this product delivered as promised. I am glad to say, it does! I already threw away my mortar! jaja. Funny thing, my husband was most impressed with the peeler. You can peel a whole bunch at once! It's brand new... it's still got some abuse to go through. Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: AngelV

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Pampered Chef
customer_reviews.text: My Pampered Chef garlic press turned black after having it for many years. I wanted to order another one and could not believe how expensive it was. I saw the great reviews on the Alpha Grillers garlic press and decided to give it a try. It works GREAT, better than my Pampered Chef garlic press. Clean up is easy and I can put it in the dishwasher. I am still working on the garlic peeler, but it is a cool concept. I am ordering another one for my son who loves to cook!
customer_reviews.author: dansue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use! Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I was so so surprised to see how beautiful and elegant this Garlic press is and the price was fantastic! It is easy to clean and so easy to use. I would definitely recommend anyone interested in buying a garlic press to go for this one. The sellers are very interested people and kept in contact as soon as my purchase went through...it helps to know if there is any kind of problem, they will be there for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Yields a lot of garlic, easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about buying a garlic press because I had hated them in the past; (I thought they were too messy, ineffective, and a waste of garlic because it didn’t yield enough crushed garlic). But, to save time in the kitchen, I figured it was time to try again after all the years of hand chopping. I am very happy with the product. Easy to use, easy to clean up, high yield of garlic output, and a sleek design. It feels sturdy and just heavy enough. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Better and faster than chopping with a knife
customer_reviews.text: I was watching a local YouTuber using a product similar to this one. When I observed the efficiency of what he did with his, I had to get one. I purchased this one and began to using it immediately. We consume A LOT of Garlic, and this product is genius. The plus is, it also does ginger, too (you have to skin it first). Overall great product and it is better and faster than using a knife.
customer_reviews.author: iFISH

customer_reviews.title: Execllent Products and Outstanding Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, heavy duty garlic press. Truly gets the job done easily ... but it does take a little hand strength to press completely. In addition, the garlic peeler is amazing. It works very well and takes little to no effort. I have purchased many garlic peelers in the past, and this product surpasses them all. In addition, the seller was wonderful and sent an introductory letter that contained directions for use of both products. Highly professional service and outstanding products. I highly recommend this seller and this product. I will most definitely buy additional items from this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: windryder

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A heavy duty, well made garlic press. This garlic press is made of top quality stainless steel, large and very easy to use and cleans in a breeze. It comes in an exclusive box and would make for a perfect gift! I must mention, that when pressing the clove(s) some crushed garlic does stick to the sides, but again what sticks is already crushed and can be emptied straight into the bowl as is - no need to recrush - so I don't see a problem there. All-in-all this is a great quality product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No More Garlic Fingers!
customer_reviews.text: This garlic presser came in a very nice package. I was eager to use it because I was so fed up with peeling and chopping garlic. Finally, no more garlic sticking to my fingers and leaving them with a strong odor. The presser is a bit larger than I expected and was not very easy to use with one hand. (I have small hands) With both hands I was able to press the garlic clove with ease. Plenty of room for 2-3 small cloves. It works as advertised and overall it was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cynts

customer_reviews.title: Can't understand negative reviews...
customer_reviews.text: Some people said the garlic squishes up the sides but I did not experience this. I think there is always going to be a little skin or whatever that gets past the sides but 95% of the garlic is squeezed out. You have to scrape it off with a knife but that's fine - way easier than trying to chop it. Pick out the leftover skin then throw it in the dishwasher. The skin roller tube works good too. This is the first garlic press I have owned - very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works!!!! The little black cylinder peels garlic quickly and effectively. The press does a great job as well. Pretty easy to clean too. The only caveat (being picky here) is that when cleaning garlic can get a bit stuck on the sides since there is a very fine gap on the seams. That is how the design is made, though, not a defect. I have spent many years looking for a good way to keep my hands away from garlic while still being able to cook with tons of it. Just found it! The package looks pretty good too, could make a nice gift for a foodie. Seller shipped pretty quickly and communicacted very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana T.

customer_reviews.title: Not very practical with lots of waste
customer_reviews.text: Average quality stainless steel. The edges aren’t smooth and the holes aren’t even circular. When you turn it it makes noisy and it isn’t smooth. Disappointed with so many positive reviews. Medium weight stainless steel (isn’t as substantial as expected “solid”) . Definitely not completely solid. When you use it to press garlic there’s a lot of waste that get trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Stats_DC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month of use, perhaps 3 or 4 times. So while squeezing a clove of garlic the metal bends and starts to split. Poor metal alloy quality. I would return or exchange but no such option two months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SB Investor

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Not all garlic presses are made the same, and this one unfortunately is a loser. It’s awful to clean. I have to use a toothpick every time to get everything out. The garlic gets stuck while it’s being used and I had to keep picking out pieces from the crevices. One of the metal squares isn’t fused all around and garlic gets caught in the cracks. After only 3 uses, this is going in the garbage (it’s not worthy of Goodwill - I don’t wish this garlic press upon anyone). Save your money and go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Falkner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old one that was making the garlic black, obviously not stainless. This is very easy to use for garlic, haven't tried ginger yet. It is very easy to clean if rinsed out immediately after use so the garlic doesn't dry and stick. The garlic peeler is fun and now I'm adding extra garlic just to play with it. Wish I had known about these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: BJT

customer_reviews.title: I miss my pampered chef model
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add after months of usage: Well, I still don’t like this garlic press. It is very well made but I find it cumbersome to use. I will be looking to buy another press. Original review: This press feels a little complicated after years of using my Pampered Chef press. This is made well and I like that it is stainless steel and maybe I will get accustomed to it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my all time favorite kitchen additions. Beforehand, my boyfriend and I would peel and chop garlic for what felt like forever. This is super easy to use, clean, and saves us so much time! I have not had any issues with rusting but I hand wash and dry it before placing it back in the box it came in. The box is very nice and I can easily see myself passing this down for generations if we have children.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rage

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve been peeling and chopping my garlic by hand all this time and this has made such a difference. I was skeptical about the peeler but it really works though odd shaped garlic cloves are a little difficult. The mincer itself is really good as well though I have found cleaning the little insert with the holes to be a little difficult even when cleaned right after use. Other than that it is great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic Press Ever
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for my daughter and used it at her house. Fell in love with it. Purchased this in July and could not be more pleased. Quality construction and easy to clean which is a biggie when you are mincing garlic. Love the silicone tube which easily takes off the skin and is so easy to clean. I highly recommend this product and the follow up from this company is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jeanniemac

customer_reviews.title: Real nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garlic press I've ever owned. It comes with a rubber tube that you put the garlic clove in and press down as you roll it back and forth, thereby loosening the skin on the clove. It also comes with a small brush to help clean the press. The garlic press is very easy to clean and does a nice job pressing the garlic. I'm quite happy with my purchase and would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: JT Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I wanted a new garlic press is because the one I currently have pushes much of the garlic to the side and out of the press leaving a large chunk that has to be reloaded. When I opened up this press, I saw a gap on each side and assumed this one would do the same thing. I was very wrong. This thing pushes even the biggest garlic clove through with ease and leaves little to no garlic in the chamber! I am so glad I bought it. Thanks, Debbie
customer_reviews.author: Scott Holland

customer_reviews.title: My favorite small kitchen utensil!
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I waited so long to get one of these! I eat and cook with garlic so often. This tool is so handy and makes cooking with garlic even more enjoyable! My hands are small so sometimes it is a little hard for me to get my hands completely around the handles to squeeze. I love that I don't have to touch the peeled garlic and my fingers don't get sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Synthavanh

customer_reviews.title: the beautiful and sturdy box that I am still using to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this company exceeded my expectations. The email with instructions for optimal use prior to receiving the garlic press; the prompt delivery; the beautiful and sturdy box that I am still using to store my garlic press. Most importantly, the item works wonderfully: very easy to use and very easy to clean. Excellent results. I highly recommend it. I am extremely happy with the garlic press and the company and I would not hesitate ordering from the company again. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Parvell

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the replacement is holding up fine! just after the return window, one of the two parts that goes into the handle popped out. Looks like the whole mechanism loosened up allowing it to come apart. I wonder where these are made?
customer_reviews.author: MovieBuff2008

customer_reviews.title: the size is a little intimidating, but it works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to clean and pretty easy to squeeze. I have a weak grip because of arthritis so those are important features. I also like the little silicone sleeve to remove the skins if desired. However, I don't recommend removing them if using the press on them because the skin helps make removal of the leftover bits and cleaning it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Eye-Opener for Cooking Neophyte
customer_reviews.text: This set tackles tasks quite outside my previous experience. I just started cooking, at age 65. I love garlic but shied away because it is such a hassle to peel and slice. This solved both those problems. The press takes a little strength to squeeze so the fat handles are essential. More even than most cookware, it's important to clean it before left-over elements dry onto it, due to small holes and corners. The peeler doesn't solve things as well as I'd like, though it's much better than trying to peel without it. Plus, it is usually superfluous if you're using the press. Now I use much more garlic!
customer_reviews.author: Bill A

customer_reviews.title: A decent product at the price point.
customer_reviews.text: A decent product at the price point. The press itself isn't what I would call high-end, though it was worth the $15. There's a bit of a gap on the sides of what I'm going to call the plunger (the part that goes inside the grater part) and the basket/grater part. This leaves the garlic cloves squirting up the sides a bit. The rivet that everything hinges on does make me wonder how long it will last, but at the price point it really only needs to make it a year or two, in my opinion. The garlic peeler is awesome and makes you wonder why you spent years peeling garlic the hard way!
customer_reviews.author: J. Eshleman

customer_reviews.title: For garlic lovers, saves so much time!
customer_reviews.text: My first press and will continue using. Very much enjoy and so much faster! We cook with a ton of garlic. They provide the rubber piece to remove the garlic skins which makes it go so much quicker. The press itself I suggest cleaning right after. It’s easy cleanup if so. You do have to remove some skin in the press but very easy. Garlic is very sticky. But sooo worth it. Also suggest only doing 1-2 cloves at a time.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a love/hate relationship with using fresh garlic. It definitely made a huge difference with taste, but cutting it up with a knife was difficult and grating it left my fingers smelly and sticky. I have used other cheap garlic presses in the past, and they have been awful. After reading the reviews, I got this one and I am so impressed! I actually get excited to use fresh garlic because of how easy it is to press!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a complete package: Peeler, Press, Cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: The garlic press does what it says it'll do. The bulky grip is very satisfying and comfortable to use. It's easy to clean because of the stiff little brush that's included. And I've tried mashing garlic with and without the peel. And it's a lot more productive without the peel. And so I really really enjoy the garlic rolling sleeve that is also included. Great package, and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Wellborn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but small and hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I inherited my mom's old school garlic press and loved it, so when it became rusty, I was very unwilling to spend a lot on a pretty simple gadget. I did shell of the money. This is a good garlic press and does the job very well. However, the compartment for the garlic is VERY small. I can only fit 2 cloves in and it's hard to clean. Some of the garlic presses have a rubber/plastic piece that you can use to push out the garlic from the holes, but this one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kcs seattle

customer_reviews.title: GARLIC LOVERS: STOP AND LOOK NO FURTHER
customer_reviews.text: i freaking LOVE IT. ive turned 6 ppl onto it now! I am a garlic junkee. Its in everything. And i got so tired of peeling i just bought peeled garlic . Ive used other presses and knew i needed to get one. But this one, its strong, its big enough to use up all those little cloves at once, easy to clean and it NEVER gets put away because it just lives in the dish strainer from using it sooooo much!!! It has been a long time ive been this excited about a purchase and ive had it for about a month now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but not to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use, especially compared to chopping up garlic myself. The only problem is that it’s very hard to clean and smells weird if you don’t get it very clean every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, nice looking, and does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect...but close enough! Everything about it is amazing except a bit tough to clean. But that is expected with any garlic press. Only OXO pressed had an integrated tool to pop out garlic bits. But this press comes with a nice brush and pick tool to clean. Solid construction. I've snapped other presses, but can't imagine this metal press could possibly snap unless I have garlic made of diamond and forearms like Captain America. Since neither of those are true, this thing will last!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Garlic Peeler and Press Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best press devices that we have ever used! Easy to use & easy to clean as well, and that is an important aspect when peeling and pressing a lot of garlic cloves. We especially like the ease of the peeler when removing the outer skins of the cloves. Very well thought out system overall, and we would highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: With all due respect to the previous reviewers, this garlic press is a poor performer. When I opened the box I could see large (for a garlic press) gaps on all sides of the pressing plate. Not to judge without using, I tried it. It turned 3 cloves into 2 with waste. I tried re-adjusting the waste, which is something I'm not opposed to, but it just found it's way back to the gaps, like the path of least resistance. I thought I had bought it for my second home, but I think I really bought it for a second-hand shopper at my local donation center.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. So much value. It really is a beautiful design and it makes me love using fresh garlic again. For a while I was just buying those big jars of gminced garlic but I can tell a huge difference when using fresh now vs. the jar! The potency is crazy. And I don’t mind peeling or mining since I have this effective tool. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Highly, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have found out about this tool sooner. I love garlic and this just makes it so easy to add to everything, specially when you don't particularly feel like handling garlic and having to mince it yourself. The tool is easy to use, easy to clean, has good build quality and the finish looks like it will last for years to come. It's very easy to press, and even works just fine with the skin on! I'd recommend peeling the skin off first though, you get much more pulp out of the garlic and into your food. Stop reading reviews and just get this one, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow your heart, not your recipe
customer_reviews.text: Garlic is good for the heart, says the Doctor. Garlic is good for the soul, says the chef. This thing does exactly what it says it should, the center capsule flips up for easy cleaning, and the brush & peeler are a nice addition to the kit. The metal does flex a bit when crushing garlic, but I've used it for three months and it hasn't bent or broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Berry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the garlic peeler worked and worked well. I bought this for the press but am now in love with the peeler. The press itself is excellent. It has a large space for garlic, easy to squeeze, easy to clean. I did find it did a better job if the garlic was peeled first and it didn't work great for ginger. I recommend this product and think it is a bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Squashes garlic like a pro
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is advertised to do - it smashes the crap out of garlic. It's nice and heavy, is easy to clean (even comes with a little brush to help you out in case you run into stubborn garlic), and it came in a killer nice box. I'm the kinda gal that needs two hands to squeeze one of those hand exerciser thingies, and this press is super easy for me to use. Now when I make my meal kits, I'm not taking forever to cut up cloves of garlic into tiny little pieces, and I'm enjoying meal preparation more. I haven't played with the peeler yet, but I expect that to go well too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Presses cloves beautifully. Have peeled closed in the fridge so have not tried peeler-tube yet but the press performs very well. Bought and returned 4 presses from Bed Bath Beyond and other local shops they only smashed the cloves. SO frustrating! But the Alpha Grillers press does the job. Very well built. Good heft to it but not excessively heavy. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W.

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than mincing garlic, so much time saved.
customer_reviews.text: I just want you to know that I do not know what ergonomic means, I am too lazy to google it, but I shall rate this thing as high as possible. I freaking love it. It does its job. I usually get already-peeled garlic from the store so I can't tell you if it would press unpeeled garlic. And I do cut the stem bit of the garlic most of the time. Not all the time, but most. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Andriana DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: It works. But you can only do a couple cloves before you need to clean it. Which is a huge pain in the ass to do. Big waste of money don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Grox

customer_reviews.title: Love the Silicone easy roll tube
customer_reviews.text: The box was great. The easy roll tube is wonderful for peeling garlic. A real time saver. Put the clove in the tube and roll it around on the counter. No more smelly hands. We didn't like the press. Too many swinging parts. It was hard to clean out all of the small places where the garlic was pressed into. There are other options with cleaners built into the handle which have tines on them to fit into all of the little holes and push the unpressed garlic out. It makes it way easier. Running the press under water as you are cleaning out the peels helps.
customer_reviews.author: HB Hottentot

customer_reviews.title: Best garlic press ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this garlic press! I absolutely love everything about it! It's very easy to use and, with partially arthritic hands, it's very comfortable, as well. I just rinse it after I use it and toss it in the top rack of my dishwasher and it comes out sparkling clean! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pattersonfan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy duty, and great chrome finish that won't wear or tarnish after a few years. My old one wore so much that the garlic would be rather gray....so I had to buy a new one. Easy to clean. The garlic roller is also wonderful and works well. I looked at another highly recommended garlic press but the price was triple this! And this is very high quality. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: The easiest Garlic Press in the World
customer_reviews.text: This is the first garlic press I have ever used. I feel that the construction is very solid. The fact that you include a silicone peeler made the use more efficient since I was not cutting off piece of the clove to help with peeling. The only possible improvement would be in ease of cleaning. I found that the very thin layer of matter left in the press required me to scrape it out. However, I discovered a brush in the packaging just a couple of days ago that seems to work better than my finger (I should have unpacked everything and read the instructions or referred back to the wonderful instructions in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is powerful enough to crush the garlic. The part I did not like was that the garlic basket is composed of folded sides- rather than a single piece. This means that there are gaps at the corners into which the husks can get stuck. I didn't think to look for that when shopping. Still, the price was great and it works really well as a press.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerBowe

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Garlic sticks along the edges of the garlic insert and is so difficult to clean. I gave up on it. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: LabelLiterate

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good customer service, received a defective one and they immediately sent a new one without requiring the other one back. Love it! It crushes an entire bulb of garlic in minutes, clove by clove (with garlic skin on or off). Downside is clean it right away under running water or else it's difficult to scrape off the skin because it dries very quickly and becomes sticky inside the crusher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible! Bought it because it's stainless to replace a Pampered Chef garlic press that was zinc. Big mistake- Huge! Hard to squeeze, hard to clean. Just bad.
customer_reviews.author: LavaBoy

customer_reviews.title: #1 Favorite Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Not the most used item in my kitchen, but definitely my favorite. I’ve started using fresh garlic in more recipes since this makes it so easy. And much more flavorful and fragrant than the pre-minced garlic in a jar. I broke two cheaper garlic pressed before buying this one, and this is worth the money 100%. Buy this one once instead of spending $5-10 twice like I did before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: crazyjake

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean it up!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this garlic press over a month with some ideas to share! It does make my garlic get crashed to small pieces to cook but it also take time to come out the amount of garlic u want if u need a lot to cook! Also it takes time to clean up the corners the the presser so I’m a little disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: PEI YING LIN

customer_reviews.title: I found the press too small to hold more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the press too small to hold more than one close of garlic and very difficult to clean. There were gaps between the sides of the grate and the handle frame so the garlic oozed out of that spot as well. As my daughters said, it took as long to use the press and clean it as it did to just manually chop the garlic by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Waldstein

customer_reviews.title: Needs power
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needs some power to press the garlic out, and I haven’t even tried to leave the skin on to press, I imagine it will be a lot harder. It could be me having very not strong hands.... so I got another one and it’s a lot easier. It’s also not very easy to clean, bc there will be layers get stuck on the presser, but that I can deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie T.

customer_reviews.title: Order it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste money on those cheap garlic press you can find in grocery stores, just order this Alpha garlic press, you wouldn't be disappointed. The customer service is amazing. After I placed the order, I received the email from seller thanked me for the business and provided information on how to use this product correctly with proper maintenance care. The press can squeeze garlic very easily, leaving only the skin. Cleaning is simple, rinse it off and put it in the dishwasher. The tool comes with the press is a smart creation as well, just put in a clove of garlic, roll it, then put it in the press, done.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A

customer_reviews.title: Press is easy use, ok to clean. Peeler is great on small cloves
customer_reviews.text: I have very small hands and it is a bit of a stretch, but I can make this garlic press work fairly easily. It is not bad to clean (if you clean it out right away) and the grate is attached so it does not get lost. The part to make peeling easier works very well on smaller cloves, not as well on big ones.
customer_reviews.author: Plankton

customer_reviews.title: built to last
customer_reviews.text: Durable, built with thick metal, I have been using the garlic press for a couple months now and I can imagine that it will last a long time. It is very easy to clean, considering the device is extruding garlic trough this small holes... it takes me 10-15 seconds to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it could be easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: It may be easier to clean than some designs, but I've seen better. The whole flip out basket design does not really do much to make it easier to clean as far as I'm concerned. It is good stainless steel, but seems just a little flimsy to me. I've switched to an Ikea model which seems sturdier and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ambler PA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy and presses all the garlic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garlic press I have used in a long time! It comes with a small rubber tube that peels the garlic super easy and fast!!! This also presses all of the garlic out and barely has any left. It is super easy to clean! It is also a lot bigger and can fit around two pieces of garlic in there.
customer_reviews.author: mcr

customer_reviews.title: The best press I ever had was pampered chef
customer_reviews.text: It still leaves lots of garlic inside. The best press I ever had was pampered chef. Which lasted years but then the coloring on the metal transferred to the garlic. So I got this one to avoid that from happening. But this one is more bulky (for smaller hands) and does not do a good job of using all the garlic. Lots of waste.
customer_reviews.author: LA Woman

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this Garlic Press Kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this kitchen tool years ago!!! When I received this in the mail, I was ready and waiting with garlic bulb in hand!! This great garlic press is just that, Great!! Does exactly as advertised! I am preparing meals with fresh minced garlic and no mess, no cutting board and no sharp knife. Preparing garlic now takes only a few seconds, literally, and right over dish on the stove if I so choose. Cleans up exactly as advertised also! NO MORE PEELING!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mape

customer_reviews.title: Garlic press for the win!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to cook and garlic is almost always used in his dishes, so I bought this to make it easier for him. We've had it for about 6 months now and it works amazingly. Its held up great, no rusting and still sharp. It's one of his favorite utensils and makes cooking go alot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Albright

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Very nice presentation
customer_reviews.text: Nice stainless steel garlic press that opens wide for easy cleaning, unlike the one I was using that wasn't stainless steel and had begun to flake plus was hard to clean. This comes in a nice box, no clamshell packaging here, which would make part of a nice gift for someone setting up their first kitchen in a home/apt.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! It's always been a pain trying to peel garlic, but you just put some cloves in that circular rubber item and roll it back and forth for a minute and voila, perfectly peeled! The crusher is great also. I got this set for my mom and just ordered one for myself. I think I will be getting some for Christmas gifts as well. Really easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Ive seen and used better ones. Wish I hadn't bought this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really work.. Ive seen and used better ones. Wish I hadn't bought this.
customer_reviews.author: neha

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, flimsy poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it's already showing signs that it's not going to last very long. The handle is solidly built, but the cup that holds garlic isn't one piece and has already started to bend. I had to bend it back into place and took me forever to work free the pieces of garlic that got wedged in there.
customer_reviews.author: Fractal32

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom but she hardly ever uses it she finds its cumbersome. I use the garlic peeler at times though and its okay
customer_reviews.author: faith

product_meta.title: Alpha Grillers Garlic Press. Stainless Steel Mincer & Crusher With Silicone Roller Peeler. Easy Squeeze, Rust Proof, Dishwasher Safe, Easy Clean
feature_bullets: SOLID STAINLESS STEEL GARLIC PRESS. The rust proof garlic press is made from 100% premium 304 stainless steel. The peeler tube is made from tough silicone. These are cooking gadgets to last a lifetime.

GARLIC MINCER FOR UNPEELED CLOVES. Thanks to the heavy duty construction and ingenious design, you can easily mince unpeeled garlic cloves. Once you press the handles, delicious paste is squeezed out, leaving just the peel inside.
A GARLIC CRUSHER THAT’S A BREEZE TO CLEAN. The large chamber flips out for easy cleaning. Simply rinse under running water or run through the dishwasher. Bonus cleaning brush included.

MULTI-USE & VERSATILE. Crush garlic, ginger and nuts with ease. Want peeled garlic for slicing? No problem! Use our amazing garlic peeler / roller to get the job done. Full instructions included in the box

LIFETIME GUARANTEE: LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK! We are so confident that you will love our Press & Peeler Set that we are offering all customers a lifetime guarantee. If at any point you decide you are not completely satisfied with your set, just drop us an email and we will refund 100% of the money. You wont get this kind of risk free service with big brands like Oxo, Zyliss, Pampered Chef and Kuhn Rikon.
